definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: pour out, pour (NH id.; As. Šapâku, pour out, esp. (Dl:WB Jen:Kosmol. 41) earth, to form mound; Ar. safaka pour out, cf. sabaka melt and pour into mould; Eth. sabaka: Aram. [[שְׁפַח]], spak (rare) = BH);—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: pour out, pour water Ex 4:9 (J; acc. loc.). 1Sa 7:6 (+ ´[[לִפְנֵי י]]:, unique, symb. of contrition), [[עַל־פְּנֵי הָאָרֶץ]] (subj. ´[[י]]:) Am 5:8, Am 9:6; blood like water (to flow away and be absorbed), [[עַל־הָאָרֶץ]] De 12:16, De 12:24, De 15:23, cf. Le 17:13 (H) Ez Eze 24:7; also + [[אֶל]] loc. Ex 29:12, Le 4:7, Le 4:18, Le 4:25, Le 4:30, Le 4:34; + [[עַל]] pers. reflex. 1Ki 18:28; pour out broth Ju Jdg 6:20, libation ([[נֶסֶךְ]], to ([[ל]]) false gods) Is 57:6; dust Le 14:41 (P; [[אֶל]] loc.); c. acc. [[סִלְלָה]] mound (in siege), = made by pouring (earth, orig. from baskets, see esp. As. šapâku Dl:WB 679 b Jen:Kosmol. 41), + [[עַל־]] of city 2Ki 19:32 = Is 37:33, Je 6:6, Ez Eze 4:2, Eze 26:8, [[אֶל־]] 2Sa 20:15; abs. Ez Eze 17:17, Eze 21:27, Da 11:15; [[מֵעָיו אַרְחָה]] ´[[וַיִּשׁ]]: 2Sa 20:10 (by a sword-thrust in the belly), cf. [[לָאָרֶץ מְרֵרָתִי]] ´[[יִשׁ]]: Job 16:13 (metaph., ´[[י]]: subj.).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: techn., acc. [[דָּם]] shed blood Ge 37:22 (E) Ge 9:6 (P) 1Sa 25:31, Ez Eze 22:4 + 9 t. Ez, + 15 t. (pass. Ps 79:10) + Ez Eze 36:18 (c. [[עַל־הָאַרֶץ]]), 1Ch 22:8 (c. [[אַ֫רְחָה]]); acc.
